data.event: Winter begins sunny and dry but becomes progressively wetter and cloudier.
Spring is generally overcast and often rainy, while summer continues to be rainy though is much sunnier; there are 9.1 days annually with 50 mm (1.97 in) of rainfall.
The monthly 24-hour average temperature ranges from 12.7 °C (54.9 °F) in January to 28.4 °C (83.1 °F) in July, and the annual mean is 21.49 °C (70.7 °F).

event.title: is delivered in bulk (47%) from April

data.event: The annual rainfall is just over 2,000 mm (79 in), and is delivered in bulk (47%) from April to June.
With monthly percent possible sunshine ranging from 23% in March to 55% in October and November, the city receives 1,842 hours of bright sunshine annually.
